game.name: Fairy Cakes
game.description:
Hey girls! Are you searching for the tricks and tips on how to create some elegant and cute desserts for your lovely dinner party? If yes, you are at the right place since today we through this awesome brand new game: Fairy Cakes are going to allow you to learn how to prepare the most delicious and tasty recipe ever. Like many others, you have grown hearing the stories of gorgeous fairies, which are, of course, the favorite creatures of many girls and boys.  

In this cute free online cooking game, you will get a chance to cook a special cupcake recipe, which is equipped with all the ingredients that make them a delicious one. Believe us ladies! These desserts are fluffy, pink and sweet and you would not stop yourself from making it in your real kitchen after enjoying it a virtual kitchen in this cool html5 game. Try these mouth-watering fairy cake to make your guests feel special. Start this fun kitchen game with gathering all the ingredients and utensils in the kitchen required to prepare this recipe. 

Mix some milk, flour, eggs, vanilla, sugar and butter in a bowl. Use this batter to fill up the paper cups that you have placed in your muffin tray. Then use an oven to bake them. Use a freezer to cool them down for a while. Mix pink food coloring, icing sugar, vanilla and butter into another bowl. Pour the pink icing on the top of the cupcakes and spread it perfectly with a spoon. Now take some sugar made beautiful flowers and spread an egg over them using a brush. Also spread some icing sugar on them. Decorate your Fairy cakes before serving them to your guests. Have fun a lot kids!
